scripts.report:merge: ls cypress/reports/*.json >/dev/null 2>&1 && mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/*.json > cypress/reports/report.json || echo "No JSON reports to merge"
scripts.report:html: ls cypress/reports/report.json >/dev/null 2>&1 && marge cypress/reports/report.json -f index -o cypress/reports/html || echo "No merged report found"
scripts.test:ci: npm run cypress:run || true && npm run report:merge && npm run report:html
